text: EasyJet Airline Company Limited, styled as easyJet, is a British low cost airline founded in 1995. Sir Stelios Haji-Ioannou started the airline in 1995. He was in charge of EasyJet until 2002. Starting in 2003, EasyJet opened many bases at airports throughout Europe. As of 2016, EasyJet is based at London Luton Airport. EasyJet currently has 26 bases and its largest base is at London Gatwick Airport. It is the second largest low-fare airline in Europe. It flies domestic and international scheduled services. It has 387 routes between 104 European and north African airports. As of 2022, EasyJet has 13,000 employees. EasyJet was featured in the television series Airline. == Gallery == File:EasyJetHQ.jpg|Hangar 89, the headquarters of EasyJet File:Easyjet A319 G-EZEZ AMS 2016-09-04.jpg|EasyJet A319, Airport Amsterdam Schiphol File:43bx - EasyJet Switzerland Boeing 737-3M8; HB-IIB@ZRH;07.11.1998 (5483337011).jpg|An EasyJet Switzerland Boeing 737-300 in the "phone number" paint-job.
